name: Rain of Embers Stance
desc: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix.
shortdesc: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix.

name: Farabellus Flip
desc: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.
shortdesc: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.
PFSnote: All characters have access to this feat.
